name: com.lavaleakgames.combo
description: A way to run automated tasks integrated in the Unity Game Engine Editor (similar to Grunt or Gulp in the web).
description_zhCN: 一种运行集成在Unity游戏引擎编辑器中的自动化任务的方法（类似于Grunt或Gulp）。

name: com.lavaleakgames.diplomata
description: Diplomata is a Unity multi language dialogues content management system and editor extension inspired by Twine, like Fungus and Yarn. Diplomata manage optionally other contents of a game like characters, inventory and quests.
description_zhCN: Diplomata是一个受Twine启发的Unity多语言对话内容管理系统和编辑器扩展，例如Fungus和Yarn。 Diplomata可以可选地管理游戏的其他内容，例如角色，装备系统和任务。
